Fix invalid data filename

raw.fixInvalidFile.Rd

Fix invalid data filename

raw.fixInvalidFile(
  filename,
  addInstrument = "",
  addUser = "",
  addProject = "",
  addSample = "",
  renameFile = FALSE
)

Arguments

filename

name of file
addInstrument

instrument to be added
addUser

user to be added
addProject

project to be added
addSample

sample to be added
renameFile

if TRUE file will be renamed

Value

returns fixed filenames

Examples

f = raw.findFiles(raw.getSamplePath(), addInstrument='MM160622SI1')
#> Error in raw.findFiles(raw.getSamplePath(), addInstrument = "MM160622SI1"): unused argument (addInstrument = "MM160622SI1")
print(f)
#> Error in print(f): object 'f' not found
f.new = raw.fixInvalidFile(f, instrument='vsm')
#> Error in raw.fixInvalidFile(f, instrument = "vsm"): unused argument (instrument = "vsm")
print(paste("Fixing:",f,"to new file:",f.new))
#> Error in paste("Fixing:", f, "to new file:", f.new): object 'f' not found
